conbody.p: The more command is used to display the contents of a text file on the terminal, one page at a time. This command is supported only for reading from a pipe. You can use the following key strokes along with this command to view the contents of a file:

li.p: RETURN (ENTER) - Scrolls up to display an additional line.
q - Returns to the command prompt.

conbody.p: Note: This command does not support any options.
This command enables you to view the contents of the one.txt file, one page at a time.
